content: show the difference between what working in the vs looks like vs not doing it note the number of stitches is different just focus on the ugliness/niceness of the color change make a magic_ring or your preferred method for starting a round start with yellow yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 in the bottom/first part of the tummy i did not work in the vs when color switching because of the increase pattern when it says increase with one in one color and one in the other color but you can still do them there if you like but note on the left side the v of the previous row is very tilted at least for me i added color highlights for the next 8 row to help with the many color changes here round 4 the stitch pattern will be 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 with the following color changes 2 single_crochet in yellow increase with one in yellow and one in orange 2 single_crochet in orange increase in orange 2 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow 2 single_crochet in yellow increase in orange 2 single_crochet in orange increase with one orange and one yellow 2 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow in the end you will have 24 stitches 3 in yellow 5 in orange 6 in yellow 5 in orange 5 in yellow round 5 the stitch pattern will be 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 with the following color changes 3 single_crochet in yellow increase with one in yellow and one in orange 3 single_crochet in orange increase in orange single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin previous row 1 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow 1 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row single_crochet in orange increase in orange 3 single_crochet in orange increase with one in orange and one in yellow 3 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow in the end you will have 30 stitches 4 in yellow 7 in orange 6 in yellow 7 in orange 6 in yellow round 6 the stitch pattern will be 4 single_crochet increase x 6 36 with the following color changes 4 single_crochet in yellow increase with one in yellow and one in orange 4 single_crochet in orange increase in orange 2 single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row 2 single_crochet in orange increase in orange 4 single_crochet in orange increase with one in orange and one in yellow
